Page praised Eric Schmidt for an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. "There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, he said. " Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role," he said

Linas Kleiza shrugged off his career night: It was just one of those games where the shots were going down. Carmelo Anthony and Allen Iverson were doing a great job sharing the ball, he said. Simon Cowell is also excited to have kids as young as 12 years old audition- an opinion he didn't always have. American Idol? "I haven't seen a full episode," he said. I saw a three-minute recap. From what I've seen and from what I've heard, it all seems to be going well. And I always thought that would be the case. "What I was more concerned about was the ratings falling off a cliff, meaning that the whole genre might be over, Simon Cowell continued. "The good news is that people are still excited about these shows, whether it be... Dancing With the Stars, which has gotten better over the years, America's Got Talent.
